testCase.name: AuthService should be defined after module initialization
AuthService validateUser should return a defined user response if the user is present in the database
AuthService validateUser should return undefined response if the user is not present in the database
AuthService singIn should return accessToken if the user is present in the database
AuthService login should return a JWT token and login response when a valid user is provided
AuthService login should return a exception when an invalid user is provided
AuthService loginGuest() should call the loginResponseForGuest() method and return login response for a guest user
AuthService loginResponseForGuest() should return login response for a guest user
AuthService getHomeDetailsForUserId should return a home detail response for the given user
AuthService getPowerboard() should return the powerboard response inside login response for a user who visited any team earlier
AuthService changePassword() should return the user with updated password
AuthService systemAdminHome() should return home response for system admin
AuthService teamMemberTeamAdminHome() should return a home detail response for the team member or team admin
AuthService homeDetailsForTeamMemberAdmin() should return home detail for the team member or team admin
AuthService getPrivileges() should return the priveleges if the user is system admin or guest
AuthService getPrivileges() should return the priveleges if the user is team admin or team member associated with any team
AuthService register should register a new user if not exists
TeamCrudService should be defined after module initialization
TeamCrudService updateTeam() should update the team test 1 if team not found
TeamCrudService updateTeam() should update the team test 2 if team found
TeamCrudService getTeamInfoById() get all 5 kpis details along with sprint and status test 1 if team not present in db
TeamCrudService getTeamInfoById() get all 5 kpis details along with sprint and status test 2 if team present in db and user is System Admin

testCase.name: TeamCrudService getCenterByTeamId() should ftech all center in the team test 1 if team not found
TeamCrudService getCenterByTeamId() should ftech all center in the team test 2 if team found
TeamCrudService getLinksForTeam() getLinksForTeam() should fetch the all the links of the team if priveleges includes view-links
TeamCrudService getLinksForTeam() getLinksForTeam() should fetch the all the links of the team if priveleges does not include view-links
TeamCrudService getMultimediaForTeam() it should return all the multimedia related to the team
TeamCrudService should be defined after module initialization
TeamCrudService getTeamsByCenterId() should update the team test 1 if no team found inside centerId
TeamCrudService getTeamsByCenterId() should update the team test 2 if teams found inside centerId
TeamCrudService uploadLogoForTeam() should upload logo of a team

testCase.name: TeamCrudService deleteLogoForTeam() should delete logo of a team
TeamCrudService deleteLogoForTeam() should throw error if file not present in path
TeamCrudService addTeam() should throw error if team is already present in db
TeamCrudService addTeam() should add team if team is not already present in db
TeamCrudService addTeam() should create new team if team is not already present in db and even if logo is not there
TeamCrudService deleteTeamById() should delete team if team is present in db
TeamCrudService deleteTeamById() should throw error if team is not present in db
TeamCrudService getAllTeams() should return all the teams present in the db
TeamCrudService getAllTeams() should return a message when no team is found
TeamCrudService viewTeamsInADC() should return adc Team list
TeamCrudService findTeamById() should return the team if it is present in the db
TeamCrudService updateTeamStatus() should update the status of team
